name: Discharge (itch) (ConsoleX)
description:
Reach the end of this puzzle map to remove your ability!

Backstory: You have been put through a failed science experiment, and you can now harness lightning. However, the government can't risk having someone with too much power on the surface, so they have trapped you in a dungeon far underneath the lab. Your goal is to reach the lab and remove your powers so that you can live a regular life!

Controls: 

Movement: A / D                         

Jumping: Spacebar

Dash: R

Sword: E

Lightning: T

Art Credit:

- Main Character Art: @huges laborde  (Asset Pack)

- Developer: @ConsoleX

- Tileset: @aamatniekss (Asset Pack)
